title: Implement Master-Details Pattern Integration
description: Integrate the three master-details interaction patterns (navigation, popup, slider) into booking management workflows

user_stories: As a user, I want to seamlessly navigate between booking list and details so that I can manage bookings efficiently
As a user, I want to create bookings without losing context so that I can complete tasks quickly
business_rules: Master-details pattern must support three interaction modes
Pattern must maintain user context during navigation
Pattern must handle form submission and validation properly
Pattern must follow the design system specifications
edge_cases: Handling form submission with validation errors
Managing navigation state during pattern transitions

acceptance_criteria: Navigation pattern allows seamless transition between list and form
Popup pattern opens booking form in modal without losing context
Slider pattern provides side-by-side list and form view
All patterns handle form submission and validation correctly
Patterns work correctly on mobile devices

e2e_tests: Complete booking workflow with master-details patterns

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement master-details patterns following React best practices. Ensure proper state management and context preservation. Handle mobile-specific interaction patterns.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks within master-details patterns
